mapper.select:
select ( SELECT COUNT(InterviewRecord.CandidateID) FROM interviewrecord LEFT JOIN candidate on interviewrecord.CandidateID = candidate.CandidateID LEFT JOIN student on candidate.StudentID = student.StudentID LEFT JOIN university on student.UniversityID = university.UniversityID LEFT JOIN job on job.JobID = candidate.JobID LEFT JOIN enterprise on enterprise.EnterpriseID = job.EnterpriseID where university.IsNEF = 1 and enterprise.EnterpriseID=1 and InterviewRecord.InterviewTime BETWEEN #{start1} and #{end1}) as studentSumisNef,
( SELECT COUNT(InterviewRecord.CandidateID) FROM interviewrecord LEFT JOIN candidate on interviewrecord.CandidateID = candidate.CandidateID LEFT JOIN student on candidate.StudentID = student.StudentID LEFT JOIN university on student.UniversityID = university.UniversityID LEFT JOIN job on job.JobID = candidate.JobID LEFT JOIN enterprise on enterprise.EnterpriseID = job.EnterpriseID where university.IsTOO = 1 and enterprise.EnterpriseID=1 and InterviewRecord.InterviewTime BETWEEN #{start1} and #{end1}) as studentSumisToo,
( SELECT COUNT(InterviewRecord.CandidateID) FROM interviewrecord LEFT JOIN candidate on interviewrecord.CandidateID = candidate.CandidateID LEFT JOIN student on candidate.StudentID = student.StudentID LEFT JOIN university on student.UniversityID = university.UniversityID LEFT JOIN job on job.JobID = candidate.JobID LEFT JOIN enterprise on enterprise.EnterpriseID = job.EnterpriseID where university.IsDFG = 1 and enterprise.EnterpriseID=1 and InterviewRecord.InterviewTime BETWEEN #{start1} and #{end1})as studentSumisDfg
